content: Based on available prescription data purchased from third parties and also on data we received directly from our preferred pharmacy network, XHANCE average net revenue per prescription for the second quarter of 2022 was $235, an increase of 6% compared to the $221 of revenue per prescription in the second quarter of 2021.Year-to-date, 2022 average net revenue per prescription stands at $210, an increase of 12% compared to $188 for the 6 months ended June 30, 2021.
